name: Is All Fair In Love And War? Part 1 Quiz | Movies | 10 Questions
tags: How to Lose a Guy in 10 Days

questions.explanation:
Kate Hudson.

	Kate Garry Hudson was born on April 19, 1979 to Goldie Hawn and Bill Hudson. Her television debut was on the Fox series "Party of Five", and her movie debut was on "200 Cigarettes".

Matthew McConaughey.

	Matthew David McConaughey was born on November 4, 1969. His first acting job was in a beer commercial, and his movie debut was in "Dazed and Confused". Matthew was the first choice to play Jack Dawson in "Titanic".

questions.text: What magazine did Andie work for?
questions.explanation:
Composure.

	Andie was a graduate student who wrote the "How to. ." column for "Composure" magazine.

questions.text: Ben: "Diamonds are about as common as _____."
questions.explanation:
Taxis.

	Ben and his partners Tony and Thayer were working on branching out in the advertising business, and working on the diamond account. Ben was telling Tony and Thayer how common diamonds were while the three of them were in the office.

questions.text: Did Andie bring a green sweater to Michelle after she was dumped?
questions.explanation:
Yes.

	It was a ritual that Andie and Jeanie performed when Michelle's boyfriends broke up with her. The sweater was something new that Andie picked up to make Michelle feel and look good. Michelle brought Andie a suede blouse toward the end of the movie.

questions.text: What nickname did Ben give the two Judys?
questions.explanation:
Lips and Hips.

	Judy Spears was played by Michael Michele, and Judy Greer was played by Shalom Harlow.

questions.text: Who said this? "Mullen's is the apres work watering hole for the upwardly mobile."
questions.explanation:
Jeannie.

	Jeannie Ashcroft (Annie Parisse) made this comment when they walked into Mullen's looking for Andie a man.

questions.text: Did Ben answer 'true or false' to Andie, when she asked him if all was fair in love and war?
questions.explanation:
True.

	On the night they first met, Ben and Andie went to a seafood restaurant to get something to eat. Andie asked Ben if all was fair in love and war. Ben said true and Andie said "Good answer". Ben replied, "Good question."

questions.text: What kind of drink did Andie first ask for when they were at the Knick's game?
questions.explanation:
Coke, no ice.

	To annoy Ben further, when he brought the drink to her Andie told him she wanted Diet Coke not regular Coke.

Sleepless in Seattle.

	Andie was trying to annoy him by talking throughout the movie. She made it worse when she found out it was his favorite movie.
